thread.title: Mizuho Ends Talks to Buy Majority Stake in Philippines Bank
thread.title_full: Mizuho Ends Talks to Buy Majority Stake in Philippines Bank - WSJ

author: P.R. Venkat
title: Mizuho Ends Talks to Buy Majority Stake in Philippines Bank
text:
Mizuho Financial Group Inc. has ended talks to buy a majority stake in Philippine lender Bank of Commerce after failing to persuade its owners to lower its price tag from more than $500 million, people with knowledge of the deal said.
Mizuho, Japanâ€™s third-largest bank by revenue, began talks early this year to buy the 60% Bank of Commerce stake owned by Philippine conglomerate San Miguel Corp. and was the only bidder left. Its decision to pull out signals increasing caution by growth-hungry Japanese acquirers about...
